entries.name: Age
entries: Wayang reach maturity at around 40 years of age, and can live up to 300 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Wayang culture guides its members toward neutrality; they tend to avoid the conflicts of others and seek the balance found in shadow, although they can be of any alignment.

entries.name: Size
entries: Wayang usually stand up to 4 feet tall and weigh up to 50 pounds. Your size is Small.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You cannot discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Lurker
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Perception} and {@skill Stealth} skills.

entries.name: Shadow Magic
entries: You know the {@spell minor illusion} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell pass without trace} spell with this trait. Starting at 5th level, you can also cast the {@spell nondetection} spell with it. Once you cast {@spell pass without trace} or {@spell nondetection} with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast either of those spells using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level.
Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Light and Dark
entries: When you take necrotic damage, you can use your reaction to gain immunity against that instance of the damage, and you regain a number of hit points equal to half the damage you would have taken. Once this reaction is used, it can't be used again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write {@language Common} and {@language Goblin}.

entries.name: Age
entries: Orang-Pendek reach maturity at less than 20 years of age, and usually live up to 80 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Orang-Pendek tend to favor lawful neutrality, living off of the land with their ape comrades.

entries.name: Size
entries: Orang-Pendek usually stand between 3 to 5 feet tall and weigh up to 150 pounds. Your size is Small.

entries.name: Forest Walker
entries: You have advantage on {@skill Stealth} checks in forests and jungles, and can attempt to {@action hide} even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, mist, and other natural phenomena.

entries.name: Simian Empathy
entries: You have proficiency in {@skill Animal Handling} and {@skill Survival}.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write {@language Common} and {@language Sylvan}.
